about_the_game:
Developer Note: Due to the Unity licensing issues arising in September 2023, the direction of this game has changed, as the original 3D multiplayer concept was no longer viable.

Embark on an interstellar adventure with Extermination Overdrive, a thrilling 2D space shooter that pays homage to the golden era of '80s arcade games. Get ready to pilot your spacecraft through the vast expanse of space, engaging in epic battles against a fleet of enemy ships. With its retro-inspired graphics and heart-pounding gameplay, Extermination Overdrive invites you to dodge, weave, and blast your way through wave after wave of relentless foes. Whether you're a nostalgic gamer or a newcomer to the genre, prepare for an action-packed journey that will test your skills and reflexes. Jump into the cockpit and join the fight for galactic supremacy in Extermination Overdrive!
detailed_description:
Developer Note: Due to the Unity licensing issues arising in September 2023, the direction of this game has changed, as the original 3D multiplayer concept was no longer viable.

Embark on an interstellar adventure with Extermination Overdrive, a thrilling 2D space shooter that pays homage to the golden era of '80s arcade games. Get ready to pilot your spacecraft through the vast expanse of space, engaging in epic battles against a fleet of enemy ships. With its retro-inspired graphics and heart-pounding gameplay, Extermination Overdrive invites you to dodge, weave, and blast your way through wave after wave of relentless foes. Whether you're a nostalgic gamer or a newcomer to the genre, prepare for an action-packed journey that will test your skills and reflexes. Jump into the cockpit and join the fight for galactic supremacy in Extermination Overdrive!
name: Extermination Overdrive

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz CPU
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 970, AMD Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3 GHz CPU
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 970, AMD Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Extermination Overdrive is a single player 2D arcade shooter set in space. Battle swarms of enemy space craft and massive dreadnoughts.
